edu.nd.darts.cimon
Class OrientationService

java.lang.Object
  edu.nd.darts.cimon.MetricService<Float>
      edu.nd.darts.cimon.OrientationService
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObservableUpdate
public final class OrientationService
extends MetricService<Float>

Monitoring service for orientation sensor. The orientation of the device, as calculated through Android sensor services, using accelerometer and magnetometer data. This service will register with Accelerometer service and Magnetometer service in order to coordinate updates. Orientation metrics:

  • Azimuth (radians)
  • Pitch (radians)
  • Roll (radians)

    Author:
    darts
    See Also:
    MetricService

    onSensorUpdate

    public long onSensorUpdate(SensorEvent event)
    Callback method for updates of accelerometer and magnetometer readings. This method mimics that of the Android sensor framework, allowing the accelerometer and magnetometer services to provide updates to this service when new data is available.

    Parameters:
    event - data from new accelerometer or magnetometer reading
    Returns:
    time for next update of orientation metrics
